text.section:
A person may not:
interfere with or hinder the performance of any duty of the Commissioner under this subtitle; or
knowingly give false information to the Commissioner.

A person may not knowingly:
employ a minor in violation of a provision of this subtitle; or
allow a minor to be employed in violation of a provision of this subtitle.

section.section: A person who violates any provision of subsection (a) of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $1,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 90 days or both.

A person who violates any provision of subsection (b) of this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $10,000 or imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or both.
